feed.title: Zakzak Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Zakzak news and events.

entry.title: How it works
entry.summary:
Benchmarking can be as easy as calling new Date() twice, but an easy solution is not always the best solution. Zakzak employs a rather complicated procedure for benchmarking, which is also the reason why it is so accurate and consistent.

In this blog post I will discuss how zakzak works internally.
